name: LongNeckMonster
description:
[HEADS UP]: I GAVE UP ON THIS PROJECT LONG BEFORE THE DEADLINE, IT'S NOT COMPLETE IN ANY WAY.

Try and escape a laboratory, after a freak accident left you with an innexplicably long neck.

Your head has vision, and your body has movement. Both are joined together by a very clumsy, long, flacid neck. Still you are up for the challenge

Complete puzzles to open doors and progress!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement (Very Floaty)

E: Pick up Head (Better movement and grants more light)

Q: Anchor/realese from an anchor point (Need to be prompted)

Click: "Attack" (Slight lunge forward, does absolutly nothing)

Objective: Open the doors

How?: Each door has flags around them, touch them all with any means necesary, even friendly npc's will help you.

Game Dev: official

Music: E1ngel (Commissioned)

Thanks for playing my new hot mess!!
